name: utsuroi
description: This is a plug-in for easy switching animation of 3D models of Three.js.

scripts.start: npm run watch & npm run lite
scripts.build:production: browserify src/Utsuroi.js --standalone Utsuroi -t babelify -p licensify | derequire > build/utsuroi.js
scripts.build:develop: browserify src/Utsuroi.js --standalone Utsuroi -t babelify -d -p licensify | derequire > build/utsuroi.js
scripts.release: npm run build:production && npm run minify && npm run versionup && npm publish

author: sawa-zen
